text: To calculate annual coverage, the consolidated number of HPV doses given, by age and dose, during the year is used as the numerator.Estimates of the target population19 are used as the denominator.As mentioned earlier, single-age estimates of the target population by district can usually be obtained from the National Statistics Office or when better options are not available derived from population estimates of five-year age groups.
